reviews.review_text:
Excellent location. Wow taste and Ambience.  Great variety., Clean Spacious Rooms and my room had a lovely sitout.
Warm Hospitality of the hosts and extra effort put in to make the stay comfortable is heartening.
The ambience @ the Bar is too good ( check out the pics) .
Freshly baked is a bakery and literally everything we tasted there is so yummy healthy and made with so much Love. ‚ù§Ô∏è They bake egglessüëå. It amazing taste and healthy too....guilt free indulgence üòÑ‚ù§Ô∏è
Thanks to the whole team for making our trip so so memorable

Terrible experience at this place. We ordered just 2 dishes, a plate of butter garlic prawns and red sauce pasta. They took 45 mins to bring the butter garlic prawns and it was absolutely tasteless. Like there was no salt in it and they were so dry.  The red sauce pasta had the taste of raw carrots in it. Also, earlier I had asked the price of people's beer at the bar and he said it's for Rs 200 but in the bill they charged me Rs 350 for it and then I had to ask them to revise and get the bill. Overpriced place and not worth it.

fantastic music and a wonderful atmosphere, this place has a lovely outdoor area where you can relax and enjoy drinks. We had a delightful meal, including jeera rice, paneer butter masala, and bread beer. The service was excellent, and we absolutely love this spot. It's definitely a must-visit when you're in North Goa.
